page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT
page.content: This area has a very low population. By far the most important source of employment in the area is farming. The landowner (the Duke) and the tenant farmer both live out of the area. The shepherds and farmworkers live in farmhouses at Greenside Hill, Hartside and Alnhammoor and in other houses in Linhope. The old peoples home in Linhope also provides a small number of jobs for nurses and porters. The children of this and other areas in the Ingram valley travel to first school at Branton (8 miles away) ,middle school at Wooler (15 miles away), and high school at Alnwick ( also 15 miles away).
